notes.title: Hello Vue
notes.content: This is a sample post. It is a very good framework. It is very easy to learn and use. It is also very powerful.

notes.title: JSON Server
notes.content: It helps mock APIs easily. It is a simple and easy to use tool. It is also very powerful.

notes.title: Tailwind CSS
notes.content: It is a utility first CSS framework. It is a very good alternative to Bootstrap. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Lucide
notes.content: It is a icon collection. It is a very good alternative to Font Awesome. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Vue Router
notes.content: It is a client side router. It is a very good alternative to React Router. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Vite
notes.content: It is a build tool. It is a very good alternative to Webpack. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Vue 3
notes.content: It is a JavaScript framework. It is a very good alternative to React. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Vuetify
notes.content: It is a UI framework. It is a very good alternative to Material Design. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Vue CLI
notes.content: It is a tool for generating Vue projects. It is a very good alternative to Create React App. It is also very easy to learn and use.

notes.title: Vue Devtools
notes.content: It is a tool for debugging Vue projects. It is a very good alternative to React Devtools. It is also very easy to learn and use.
